text:
STUDIOS—UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON
CHANNEL
KCTS-TV
TRANSMITTER—EDISON TECHNICAL SCHOOL
SEATTLE 5, WASHINGTON
September 18, 1961
Bill Harley, Pres.
NAEB
Washington, D. C.
SEP 2 0 1961
A Hi
■?l?l?|W(H|i2|i|2|3|4|g|S
Dear Bill:
What about your attending the NETRC Affiliates
meeting in New York just ahead of NAEB?
Have you been invited by the Center to attend?
Do you expect to be invited? Or can I invite
you as an additional representative of our
station? Or will Mac invite you as an addit¬
ional member of WHA-TV?
I would hope that Jack or Jim would invite you
out of their desire to maintain good working
relationship with NAEB -- but if they don't and
you can and will attend, I'd be glad to have you
come up under my colors.
You probably know the meeting is at the Barbizon
Plaza startling Thursday noon, October 19th and
running thru lunch on Saturday. Those of us on
the NAEB Board should probably go down to Washington
Saturday afternoon to be there for the NAEB Board
meeting Sunday morning -- right?
Let me know if there is anything you would like me
to do on this.
Loren B. Stone
University of Washington Seattle Public Schools 9 King County Schools Seattle University Seattle Pacific College Seattle Public Library
